originalText.text: Dr. Mei is an EXCELLENT physician committed and devoted to the wellbeing of her patients. She is highly knowledgeable and relates with her patients with genuine compassion and care. She truly is one of the best physicians I have come across! She successfully treated me for frozen shoulder in a fraction of the time that the orthopedic surgeon said it will take. I am currently seeing her for overall wellbeing and health. She is the best!

text.text: Dr. Mei is an EXCELLENT physician committed and devoted to the wellbeing of her patients. She is highly knowledgeable and relates with her patients with genuine compassion and care. originalText.text: I was suffering from a chronic back/groin  pain  when I decided to visit Margaret Mei. I had no time and money to waste going from orthopaedics to physical therapists.                                                                    From session 1, she identified the root causes of my injury and gave me acupuncture treatment. I felt so much better from the beginning. In the following visits she also implemented electric suction cupping therapy loosening up muscle tension.  I thought I would never get over it but thanks to Margaret pain has disappeared! I am back to my normal!!!!                                  She is is very knowledgeable, empathetic and committed to the wellness of her patients. Definitely her studies in both western and Chinese  medicine are invaluable but it is also her pure energy that calms your soul and body. She definitely knows what she is doing..

originalText.text: I was in constant pain from a lower back injury. I was going to an Orthopedist, Pain Management, Neurologist and chiropractor. In addition to getting multiple epidurals, branch blocks and even an ablation. Nothing was working, until I visited Dr Mei. On my first visit I handed Dr Mei the results of my MRI's and nerve tests. She placed them down and said I will look at them later, let me examine you first. The complete opposite of every other Dr I visited. And so were the results. Dr Mei's treatment methods are second to none and geared towards the individual patient. After suffering for close to a year.After three visits, Dr Mei was able to reduce the pain, increase my mobility and generally help me get back to enjoying the life I remembered. I have so much confidence in Dr Mei, I brought two of my children to her for treatment. She's a great Dr and all around great person.

originalText.text:
Describing the pain...

To an utmost unbearable measure.
From a roaring wave, the pane diminishes pleasure.
I feel the thorns beneath like subtle waves up and down my leg to my feet.

My work means of life is artsy as artist strife.
The art of it all is with my parent's life.
I help them with everyday chores.Cooking, lifting, laundry, and all.
My dad's dementia fights back with withdrawal.
Pain waits at the end of that hall.
That pinches each nerve as I walk its thralls.

I Heard a name from a friend, " Ms. Mei", Name that brought curiosity that made me sway.

I made an appointment without dismay.
On the painful journey to meet Ms. Margaret Mei.
I finally got to Ms. Mei with enormous relief with my painful sway.
It felt like forever commuting with pain made me feel that way.

On that table, unknowing what to expect.
Dr. Mei started her Procedure with a gentle tap.
She knew my pain, her methods brought peace back.

Odd is it Mei, our odd is it might for the first time, I slept peacefully without turning in pain through the night.

The work Of "Dr. Margaret Mei" Gave Me a New LIFE.

THANK YOU "Ms. MEI" and to all... MEI you have a stressless LIFE.

Burt Robinson
